clinical_history: Patient with persistent infection and fever of unknown origin.
findings: Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
Focal increased uptake in axillary lymph nodes, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
recommendations: Correlate with MRI/CT for precise anatomical localization.
